<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.04</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Detection </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Positions </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns units in group/array below given Above Terrain Level (ATL) height.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> unit's ATL height can be found with <template><title>Inline code</title><part><name index="1"/><value>_height <template><title>=</title></template> ([[getPosATL]] _unit) [[select]] 2;</value></part></template></value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> units [[unitsBelowHeight]] height </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> units: [[Array]] of [[Object]]s </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> height: [[Number]] - height above terrain level ([[PositionATL]]) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] of [[Object]]s </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> group [[unitsBelowHeight]] height </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> group: [[Group]] - AI group </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> height: [[Number]] - height above terrain level ([[PositionATL]]) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]] of [[Object]]s </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_allOnGroudUnits = [[group]] [[player]] [[unitsBelowHeight]] 10;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_units = [[allUnits]] [[unitsBelowHeight]] 30;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[allUnits]], [[getPosATL]], [[group]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
